mci_attr_t Struct Reference
Stratify OS » Device Interface » Multimedia Card Interface

PIO Attribute Data Structure. More...

#include <mci.h>

Collaboration diagram for mci_attr_t:

Detailed Description

This structure defines how the control structure for configuring the PIO port.

Data Fields

uint8_t pin_assign
 Pin assignment.
 
uint16_t block_size
 Block size of card.
 
uint16_t mode
 OR the mci_mode_t.
 
uint32_t freq
 MCI clock frequency.
